Gromov Mikhail Mikhailovich (1899-1985 ) , Soviet Pilot, Air Force Colonel-General.

comment._content: this is the hoax article which I alluded to. I don't know what to believe, or how indeed if it were a hoax, how it was achieved.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sludgeulper] Very interesting. We have several images of the flight, which aren't yet digitized. We will be adding them to flickr shortly. The flights were very well documented, and the ANT-25 had a very long range. Here is an article which discusses the article you mentioned [thetrader2003.00freehost.com/TransPolar.htm] However, anything is possible!
